      • saveNewCourse

        public static void saveNewCourse(java.lang.String coursename,
                                 java.lang.String section,
                                 java.lang.String instructorID,
                                 java.lang.String comments,
                                 java.lang.String word)
        Save the profile of a new course in database
        Parameters:
        coursename: - Name of the course
        section: - Section of the course
        instructorID: - User name of the course's instructor
        comments: - Any extra description
        word: - Secret word used by the student to request an student account associated to this course

      • readCourses

        public static java.util.Vector<Course> readCourses(java.lang.String instructorID)
        Retrieve all courses associated to a selected instructor
        Parameters:
        instructorID: - User name of the selected instructor
        Returns:
        list of courses. A null response is returned if the instructor does not have registered courses

      • readCoursesByStudent

        public static java.util.Vector<Course> readCoursesByStudent(java.lang.String studentID)
        It retrieved all courses where a given student ('studentId') is registered
        Parameters:
        studentID: - User name of the selected student
        Returns:
        list of courses. A null response is returned if this student does not have registered courses

      • readAllCoursesExcept

        public static java.util.Vector<Course> readAllCoursesExcept(java.lang.String instructorID)
        Retrieve all courses registered in the database, except the ones associated to the instructor 'instructorID'
        Parameters:
        instructorID: - User name of the instructor whose courses are NOT needed to be retrieved
        Returns:
        list of courses. A null response is returned if no courses are found.

      • readAllCourses

        public static java.util.Vector<Course> readAllCourses()
        Retrieve all courses from the database
        Returns:
        list of courses. A null response is returned none courses is stored at the database

      • readAllVisibleCourses

        public static java.util.Vector<Course> readAllVisibleCourses()
        Retrieve all courses that can be seen by the students, when they apply for an student account
        Returns:
        list of visible courses. A null response is returned, if there is not visible courses

        Delete a selected course
        Parameters:
        courseID: - Identifier of the course profile that wants to be removed from database
        Returns:
        true if operation was executed successfully, otherwise false

      • canUpdateCourse

        public static boolean canUpdateCourse(int courseID,
                                      java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String section)
        Check if there is course stored with the given course's identifier (courseID), name and section.
        Parameters:
        courseID: - Identifier of the course
        name: - Name of the course
        section: - Section of the course
        Returns:
        true if a course with such a details exist or can be created, otherwise false (course identifier does not meet course details such as name and section)

      • updateCourse

        public static boolean updateCourse(int courseID,
                                   java.lang.String name,
                                   java.lang.String section,
                                   java.lang.String instructorID,
                                   java.lang.String comments)
        Update details of a selected course
        Parameters:
        courseID: - Identifier of the course whose details are wanted to be updated
        name: - New name of this course
        section: - New section of this course
        instructorID: - New Instructor's user name
        comments: - New additional description
        Returns:
        true, if update operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.

      • updateUserNameInstructor

        public static boolean updateUserNameInstructor(java.lang.String oldInstructorID,
                                               java.lang.String newInstructorID)
        Set a new instructor ('newInstructorID') for all courses associated to a given instructor ('oldInstructorID')
        Parameters:
        oldInstructorID: - User name of the instructor to be replaced
        newInstructorID: - User name of the instructor that replaces instructor 'oldInstructorID'
        Returns:
        true if update operation was successfully executed. Otherwise false.
